   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   24: 
   25: %%
   26: %% File operations that take filenames as parameters (* not prim_file operation) (** a drive):
   27: %% altname
   28: %% copy (*)
   29: %% del_dir
   30: %% delete
   31: %% get_cwd (**)
   32: %% list_dir
   33: %% make_dir
   34: %% make_link
   35: %% make_symlink
   36: %% open
   37: %% read_file
   38: %% read_file_info
   39: %% read_link
   40: %% read_link_info
   41: %% rename
   42: %% set_cwd
   43: %% write_file
   44: %% write_file_info
   45: %%
   46: %% File operations that opens/uses separate driver port (not connected to file)
   47: %% altname
   48: %% del_dir
   49: %% delete
   50: %% get_cwd
   51: %% list_dir
   52: %% make_dir
   53: %% make_link
   54: %% make_symlink
   55: %% read_file_info
   56: %% read_link
   57: %% read_link_info
   58: %% rename
   59: %% set_cwd
   60: %% write_file_info
   61: %% 
   62: %% Operations that use ?FD_DRV in prim_file
   63: %% open
   64: %% read_file
   65: %% write_file
   66: %%
   67: %%
   68: %% Operations that return a filename/path
   69: %% altname
   70: %% get_cwd
   71: %% list_dir
   72: %% read_link
   73: 
   74: -export([all/0,groups/0,suite/0,
   75: 	 init_per_suite/1,end_per_suite/1,
   76: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   77: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   78: -export([normal/1,icky/1,very_icky/1,normalize/1,home_dir/1]).
   79: 
   80: -define(PRIM_FILE, prim_file).
   81: 
   82: init_per_testcase(_Func, Config) ->
   83:     Config.
   84: 
   85: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
   86:     ok.
   87: 
   88: suite() ->
   89:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   90:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   91: 
   92: all() -> 
   93:     [normal, icky, very_icky, normalize, home_dir].
   94: 
   95: groups() -> 
   96:     [].
   97: 
   98: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   99:     os:internal_init_cmd_shell(),
  100:     Config.
  101: 
  102: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  103:     ok.
  104: 
  105: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  106:     Config.
  107: 
  108: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  109:     Config.
  110: 
  111: %% Check that Erlang can be started with unicode named home directory.
  112: home_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  113:     try
  114: 	Name=[960,945,964,961,953,954],
  115: 	Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  116: 	UniMode = file:native_name_encoding() =/= latin1,
  117: 	if 
  118: 	    not UniMode ->
  119: 		throw(need_unicode_mode);
  120: 	    true ->
  121: 		ok
  122: 	end,
  123: 	NewHome=filename:join(Priv,Name),
  124: 	file:make_dir(NewHome),
  125: 	{SaveOldName,SaveOldValue} = case os:type() of
  126: 					 {win32,nt} ->
  127: 					     HomePath=re:replace(filename:nativename(NewHome),"^[a-zA-Z]:","",[{return,list},unicode]),
  128: 					     Save = os:getenv("HOMEPATH"),
  129: 					     os:putenv("HOMEPATH",HomePath),
  130: 					     {"HOMEPATH",Save};
  131: 					 {unix,_} ->
  132: 					     Save = os:getenv("HOME"),
  133: 					     os:putenv("HOME",NewHome),
  134: 					     {"HOME",Save};
  135: 					 _ ->
  136: 					     rm_rf(?PRIM_FILE,NewHome),
  137: 					     throw(unsupported_os)
  138: 				     end,
  139: 	try
  140: 	    {ok,Node} = test_server:start_node(test_unicode_homedir,slave,[{args,"-setcookie "++atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())}]),
  141: 	    test_server:stop_node(Node),
  142: 	    ok
  143: 	after
  144: 	    case SaveOldValue of
  145: 		false ->
  146: 		    os:unsetenv(SaveOldName);
  147: 		_ ->
  148: 		    os:putenv(SaveOldName,SaveOldValue)
  149: 	    end,
  150: 	    rm_rf(?PRIM_FILE,NewHome)
  151: 	end
  152:     catch
  153: 	throw:need_unicode_mode ->
  154: 	    io:format("Sorry, can only run in unicode mode.~n"),
  155: 	    {skipped,"VM needs to be started in Unicode filename mode"};
  156: 	throw:unsupported_os ->
  157: 	    io:format("Sorry, can only run on Unix/Windows.~n"),
  158: 	    {skipped,"Runs only on Unix/Windows"}
  159:     end.
  160: 
  161: %% Check that filename normalization works.
  162: normalize(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  163:     rand:seed(exsplus, {1290,431421,830412}),
  164:     try
  165: 	UniMode = file:native_name_encoding() =/= latin1,
  166: 	if 
  167: 	    not UniMode ->
  168: 		throw(need_unicode_mode);
  169: 	    true ->
  170: 		ok
  171: 	end,
  172: 	Pairs = [rand_comp_decomp(200) || _ <- lists:seq(1,1000)],
  173: 	case os:type() of
  174: 	    {unix,darwin} ->
  175: 		[ true = (A =:= prim_file:internal_native2name(B)) ||
  176: 		    {A,B} <- Pairs ];
  177: 	    _ ->
  178: 		ok
  179: 	end,
  180: 	[ true = (A =:= prim_file:internal_normalize_utf8(B)) ||
  181: 	    {A,B} <- Pairs ]
  182: 
  183:     catch
  184: 	throw:need_unicode_mode ->
  185: 	    io:format("Sorry, can only run in unicode mode.~n"),
  186: 	    {skipped,"VM needs to be started in Unicode filename mode"}
  187:     end.
  188: 
  189: %% Check file operations on normal file names regardless of unicode mode.
  190: normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  191:     {ok,Dir} = file:get_cwd(),
  192:     try
  193: 	Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  194: 	file:set_cwd(Priv),
  195: 	ok = check_normal(?PRIM_FILE),
  196: 	ok = check_normal(file),
  197: 	%% If all is good, delete dir again (avoid hanging dir on windows)
  198: 	rm_rf(file,"normal_dir"),
  199: 	ok
  200:     after
  201: 	file:set_cwd(Dir)
  202:     end.
  203: 
  204: 
  205: %% Check file operations on normal file names regardless of unicode mode.
  206: icky(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  207:     case hopeless_icky() of
  208: 	true ->
  209: 	    {skipped,"This OS/FS does not support icky names at all."};
  210: 	false ->
  211: 	    {ok,Dir} = file:get_cwd(),
  212: 	    try
  213: 		Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  214: 		file:set_cwd(Priv),
  215: 		ok = check_icky(?PRIM_FILE),
  216: 		ok = check_icky(file),
  217: 		%% If all is good, delete dir again (avoid hanging dir on windows)
  218: 		rm_rf(file,"icky_dir"),
  219: 		ok
  220: 	    after
  221: 		file:set_cwd(Dir)
  222: 	    end
  223:     end.
  224: %% Check file operations on normal file names regardless of unicode mode.
  225: very_icky(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  226:     case hopeless_icky() of
  227: 	true ->
  228: 	    {skipped,"This OS/FS does not support icky names at all."};
  229: 	false ->
  230: 	    {ok,Dir} = file:get_cwd(),
  231: 	    try
  232: 		Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  233: 		file:set_cwd(Priv),
  234: 		case check_very_icky(?PRIM_FILE) of
  235: 		    need_unicode_mode ->
  236: 			{skipped,"VM needs to be started in Unicode filename mode"};
  237: 		    ok ->
  238: 			ok = check_very_icky(file),
  239: 			%% If all is good, delete dir again
  240: 			%% (avoid hanging dir on windows)
  241: 			rm_rf(file,"very_icky_dir"),
  242: 			ok
  243: 		end
  244: 	    after
  245: 		file:set_cwd(Dir)
  246: 	    end
  247:     end.
  248: 
  249: 
  250: check_normal(Mod) -> 
  251:     {ok,Dir} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  252:     try
  253: 	NormalDir = make_normal_dir(Mod, "normal_dir"),
  254: 	io:format("Normaldir = ~p\n", [NormalDir]),
  255: 	L1 = lists:sort(list(NormalDir)),
  256: 	{ok, L0} = Mod:list_dir("."),
  257: 	io:format("L0 = ~p\n", [L0]),
  258: 	L1 = lists:sort(L0),
  259: 	{ok,D2} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  260: 	true = is_list(D2),
  261: 	case Mod:altname("fil1") of
  262: 	    {error,enotsup} ->
  263: 		ok;
  264: 	    {ok,LLL} when is_list(LLL) ->
  265: 		ok
  266: 	end,
  267: 	[ true = is_list(El) || El <- L1],
  268: 	Syms = [ {S,Targ,list_to_binary(get_data(Targ, NormalDir))}
  269: 		 || {T,S,Targ} <- NormalDir, T =:= symlink ],
  270: 	[ {ok, Cont} = Mod:read_file(SymL) || {SymL,_,Cont} <- Syms ],
  271: 	[ {ok, Targ} = fixlink(Mod:read_link(SymL)) || {SymL,Targ,_} <- Syms ],
  272: 
  273: 	{ok,BeginAt} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  274: 	true = is_list(BeginAt),
  275: 	TempDir = "temp_dir",
  276: 	make_normal_dir(Mod, TempDir),
  277: 	{error,enoent} = Mod:set_cwd("tmp_dir"),
  278: 	{ok, NowAt} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  279: 	true = BeginAt =/= NowAt,
  280: 	ok = Mod:set_cwd(".."),
  281: 	{ok,BeginAt} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  282: 	rm_r(Mod, TempDir),
  283: 	true = is_list(Dir),
  284: 	[ true = is_list(FN) || FN <- L0 ],
  285: 	case Mod:make_link("fil1","nisse") of
  286: 	    ok ->
  287: 		{ok, <<"fil1">>} = Mod:read_file("nisse"),
  288: 		{ok, #file_info{type = regular}} = Mod:read_link_info("nisse"),
  289: 		ok = Mod:delete("nisse"),
  290: 		{ok, <<"fil1">>} = Mod:read_file("fil1"),
  291: 		{error,enoent} = Mod:read_file("nisse"),
  292: 		{error,enoent} = Mod:read_link_info("nisse");
  293: 	    {error,enotsup} ->
  294: 		ok
  295: 	end,
  296: 	[ begin
  297: 	      {ok, FD} = Mod:open(Name,[read,binary]),
  298: 	      BC = list_to_binary(Content),
  299: 	      {ok, BC} = Mod:read(FD,1024),
  300: 	      ok = file:close(FD)
  301: 	  end || {regular,Name,Content} <- NormalDir ],
  302: 	{error, badarg} = Mod:rename("fil1\0tmp_fil2","tmp_fil1"),
  303: 	Mod:rename("fil1","tmp_fil1"),
  304: 	{error, badarg} = Mod:read_file("tmp_fil1\0.txt"),
  305: 	{ok, <<"fil1">>} = Mod:read_file("tmp_fil1"),
  306: 	{error,enoent} = Mod:read_file("fil1"),
  307: 	Mod:rename("tmp_fil1","fil1"),
  308: 	{ok, <<"fil1">>} = Mod:read_file("fil1"),
  309: 	{error,enoent} = Mod:read_file("tmp_fil1"),
  310: 	{ok,FI} = Mod:read_file_info("fil1"),
  311: 	NewMode = FI#file_info.mode band (bnot 8#333),
  312: 	NewMode2 = NewMode bor 8#222,
  313: 	true = NewMode2 =/= NewMode,
  314: 	ok = Mod:write_file_info("fil1",FI#file_info{mode = NewMode}),
  315: 	{ok,#file_info{mode = NewMode}} = Mod:read_file_info("fil1"),
  316: 	ok = Mod:write_file_info("fil1",FI#file_info{mode = NewMode2}),
  317: 	{ok,#file_info{mode = NewMode2}} = Mod:read_file_info("fil1"),
  318: 	ok
  319:     after
  320:         case Mod:read_file_info("fil1") of
  321: 	    {ok,FII} ->
  322: 		NewModeI = FII#file_info.mode bor 8#777,
  323: 		Mod:write_file_info("fil1",FII#file_info{mode = NewModeI});
  324: 	    _ ->
  325: 		ok
  326: 	end,
  327: 	Mod:set_cwd(Dir),
  328:         io:format("Wd now: ~s~n",[Dir])
  329:     end.
  330: 
  331: check_icky(Mod) -> 
  332:     {ok,Dir} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  333:     try
  334: 	true=(length("åäö") =:= 3),
  335: 	UniMode = file:native_name_encoding() =/= latin1,
  336: 	IckyDir = make_icky_dir(Mod, "icky_dir"),
  337:  	{ok, L0} = Mod:list_dir_all("."),
  338: 	L1 = lists:sort(L0),
  339: 	io:format("~p~n~p~n~n",[L1,lists:sort(list(IckyDir))]),
  340: 	L1 = lists:sort(convlist(list(IckyDir))),
  341: 	{ok,D2} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  342: 	true = is_list(D2),
  343: 	%% Altname only on windows, and there are no non native filenames there
  344: 	%% 	case Mod:altname("fil1") of
  345: 	%% 	    {error,enotsup} ->
  346: 	%% 		ok;
  347: 	%% 	    {ok,LLL} when is_list(LLL) ->
  348: 	%% 		ok
  349: 	%% 	end,
  350: 	[ true = ((is_list(El) or (UniMode and is_binary(El))))  || El <- L1],
  351: 	Syms = [ {S,conv(Targ),list_to_binary(get_data(Targ,IckyDir))}
  352: 		 || {T,S,Targ} <- IckyDir, T =:= symlink ],
  353: 	[ {ok, Cont} = Mod:read_file(SymL) || {SymL,_,Cont} <- Syms ],
  354:  	[ {ok, Targ} = fixlink(Mod:read_link_all(SymL)) ||
  355: 	    {SymL,Targ,_} <- Syms ],
  356: 
  357: 	{ok,BeginAt} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  358: 	true = is_list(BeginAt),
  359:         _ = make_icky_dir(Mod, "åäö_dir"),
  360:         {error,enoent} = Mod:set_cwd("åä_dir"),
  361: 	{ok, NowAt} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  362: 	true = is_list(NowAt),
  363: 	true = BeginAt =/= NowAt,
  364: 	ok = Mod:set_cwd(".."),
  365: 	{ok,BeginAt} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  366:         rm_r2(Mod,"åäö_dir"),
  367: 	{OS,_} = os:type(),
  368: 
  369: 	%% Check that treat_icky really converts to the same as the OS
  370: 	case UniMode of
  371: 	    true ->
  372: 		ok = Mod:make_dir("åäö_dir"),
  373: 		ok = Mod:set_cwd("åäö_dir"),
  374: 		ok = Mod:write_file(<<"ååå">>,<<"hello">>),
  375: 		Treated = treat_icky(<<"ååå">>),
  376: 		{ok,[Treated]} = Mod:list_dir_all("."),
  377: 		ok = Mod:delete(<<"ååå">>),
  378: 		{ok,[]} = Mod:list_dir("."),
  379: 		ok = Mod:set_cwd(".."),
  380: 		rm_r2(Mod,"åäö_dir");
  381: 	    false ->
  382: 		ok
  383: 	end,
  384: 
  385: 	_ = make_icky_dir(Mod, treat_icky(<<"åäö_dir"/utf8>>)),
  386: 	if 
  387: 	    UniMode and (OS =/= win32) ->
  388: 		{error,enoent} = Mod:set_cwd("åäö_dir");
  389: 	    true ->
  390: 		ok
  391: 	end,
  392: 	ok = Mod:set_cwd(".."),
  393: 	{ok,BeginAt} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  394: 	case Mod:make_link("fil1", "nisseö") of
  395: 	    ok ->
  396: 		{ok, <<"fil1">>} = Mod:read_file("nisseö"),
  397: 		{ok, #file_info{type = regular}} = Mod:read_link_info("nisseö"),
  398: 		ok = Mod:delete("nisseö"),
  399: 		ok = Mod:make_link("fil1",treat_icky(<<"nisseö">>)),
  400: 		{ok, <<"fil1">>} = Mod:read_file(treat_icky(<<"nisseö">>)),
  401: 		{ok, #file_info{type = regular}} = Mod:read_link_info(treat_icky(<<"nisseö">>)),
  402: 		ok = Mod:delete(treat_icky(<<"nisseö">>)),
  403: 		{ok, <<"fil1">>} = Mod:read_file("fil1"),
  404: 		{error,enoent} = Mod:read_file("nisseö"),
  405: 		{error,enoent} = Mod:read_link_info("nisseö"),
  406: 		{error,enoent} = Mod:read_file(treat_icky(<<"nisseö">>)),
  407: 		{error,enoent} = Mod:read_link_info(treat_icky(<<"nisseö">>));
  408: 	    {error,enotsup} ->
  409: 		ok
  410: 	end,
  411: 	[ begin
  412: 	      {ok, FD} = Mod:open(Name,[read,binary]),
  413: 	      BC = list_to_binary([Content]),
  414: 	      {ok, BC} = Mod:read(FD,1024),
  415: 	      ok = file:close(FD)
  416: 	  end || {regular,Name,Content} <- IckyDir ],
  417:         Mod:rename("åäö2","åäö_fil1"),
  418:         {ok, <<"åäö2">>} = Mod:read_file("åäö_fil1"),
  419:         {error,enoent} = Mod:read_file("åäö2"),
  420:         Mod:rename("åäö_fil1","åäö2"),
  421:         {ok, <<"åäö2">>} = Mod:read_file("åäö2"),
  422:         {error,enoent} = Mod:read_file("åäö_fil1"),
  423: 
  424:         Mod:rename("åäö2",treat_icky(<<"åäö_fil1">>)),
  425:         {ok, <<"åäö2">>} = Mod:read_file(treat_icky(<<"åäö_fil1">>)),
  426: 	if
  427: 	    UniMode and (OS =/= win32) ->
  428: 		{error,enoent} = Mod:read_file("åäö_fil1");
  429: 	    true ->
  430: 		ok
  431: 	end,
  432:         {error,enoent} = Mod:read_file("åäö2"),
  433:         Mod:rename(treat_icky(<<"åäö_fil1">>),"åäö2"),
  434:         {ok, <<"åäö2">>} = Mod:read_file("åäö2"),
  435:         {error,enoent} = Mod:read_file("åäö_fil1"),
  436:         {error,enoent} = Mod:read_file(treat_icky(<<"åäö_fil1">>)),
  437: 
  438:         {ok,FI} = Mod:read_file_info("åäö2"),
  439: 	NewMode = FI#file_info.mode band (bnot 8#333),
  440: 	NewMode2 = NewMode bor 8#222,
  441: 	true = NewMode2 =/= NewMode,
  442:         ok = Mod:write_file_info("åäö2",FI#file_info{mode = NewMode}),
  443:         {ok,#file_info{mode = NewMode}} = Mod:read_file_info("åäö2"),
  444:         ok = Mod:write_file_info("åäö2",FI#file_info{mode = NewMode2}),
  445:         {ok,#file_info{mode = NewMode2}} = Mod:read_file_info("åäö2"),
  446: 
  447:         {ok,FII} = Mod:read_file_info(treat_icky(<<"åäö5">>)),
  448: 	true = NewMode2 =/= NewMode,
  449:         ok = Mod:write_file_info(treat_icky(<<"åäö5">>),FII#file_info{mode = NewMode}),
  450:         {ok,#file_info{mode = NewMode}} = Mod:read_file_info(treat_icky(<<"åäö5">>)),
  451:         ok = Mod:write_file_info(<<"åäö5">>,FII#file_info{mode = NewMode2}),
  452:         {ok,#file_info{mode = NewMode2}} = Mod:read_file_info(treat_icky(<<"åäö5">>)),
  453: 	ok
  454:     after
  455: 	Mod:set_cwd(Dir),
  456:         io:format("Wd now: ~s~n",[Dir])
  457:     end.
  458: 
  459: check_very_icky(Mod) -> 
  460:     {ok,Dir} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  461:     try
  462: 	true=(length("åäö") =:= 3),
  463: 	UniMode = file:native_name_encoding() =/= latin1,
  464: 	if
  465: 	    not UniMode ->
  466: 		throw(need_unicode_mode);
  467: 	    true ->
  468: 		ok
  469: 	end,
  470: 	VeryIckyDir = make_very_icky_dir(Mod, "very_icky_dir"),
  471: 	Expected = lists:sort(convlist(list(VeryIckyDir))),
  472: 	{ok, Actual} = Mod:list_dir_all("."),
  473: 	Expected = lists:sort(Actual),
  474: 	{ok,D2} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  475: 	true = is_list(D2),
  476: 	[ true = ((is_list(El) or is_binary(El)))  || El <- Expected],
  477: 	Syms = [{S,conv(Targ),list_to_binary(get_data(Targ, VeryIckyDir))}
  478: 		|| {symlink,S,Targ} <- VeryIckyDir],
  479: 	[ {ok, Cont} = Mod:read_file(SymL) || {SymL,_,Cont} <- Syms ],
  480: 	[ {ok, Targ} = fixlink(Mod:read_link_all(SymL)) ||
  481: 	    {SymL,Targ,_} <- Syms ],
  482: 
  483: 	{ok,BeginAt} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  484: 	OtherDir = [1088,1079,1091] ++ "_dir",
  485: 	true = is_list(BeginAt),
  486: 	make_very_icky_dir(Mod, OtherDir),
  487:         {error,enoent} = Mod:set_cwd("åä_dir"),
  488: 	{ok, NowAt} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  489: 	true = is_list(NowAt),
  490: 	true = BeginAt =/= NowAt,
  491: 	ok = Mod:set_cwd(".."),
  492: 	{ok,BeginAt} = Mod:get_cwd(),
  493: 	rm_r2(Mod, OtherDir),
  494: 
  495: 	case Mod:make_link("fil1","nisse"++[1088,1079,1091]) of
  496: 	    ok ->
  497: 		{ok, <<"fil1">>} =
  498: 		    Mod:read_file("nisse"++[1088,1079,1091]),
  499: 		{ok, #file_info{type = regular}} =
  500: 		    Mod:read_link_info("nisse"++[1088,1079,1091]),
  501: 		ok = Mod:delete("nisse"++[1088,1079,1091]),
  502: 		ok = Mod:make_link("fil1",<<"nisseö">>),
  503: 		{ok, <<"fil1">>} = Mod:read_file(<<"nisseö">>),
  504: 		{ok, #file_info{type = regular}} =
  505: 		    Mod:read_link_info(<<"nisseö">>),
  506: 		ok = Mod:delete(<<"nisseö">>),
  507: 		{ok, <<"fil1">>} = Mod:read_file("fil1"),
  508: 		{error,enoent} = Mod:read_file("nisse"++[1088,1079,1091]),
  509: 		{error,enoent} = Mod:read_link_info("nisse"++[1088,1079,1091]),
  510: 		{error,enoent} = Mod:read_file(<<"nisseö">>),
  511: 		{error,enoent} = Mod:read_link_info(<<"nisseö">>);
  512: 	    {error,enotsup} ->
  513: 		ok
  514: 	end,
  515: 	[ begin
  516: 	      {ok, FD} = Mod:open(Name,[read,binary]),
  517: 	      BC = list_to_binary([Content]),
  518: 	      {ok, BC} = Mod:read(FD,1024),
  519: 	      ok = file:close(FD)
  520: 	  end || {regular,Name,Content} <- VeryIckyDir ],
  521: 	Mod:rename([956,965,963,954,959,49],
  522: 		   [956,965,963,954,959]++"_fil1"),
  523:         {ok, <<"åäö2">>} = Mod:read_file([956,965,963,954,959]++"_fil1"),
  524: 	{error,enoent} = Mod:read_file([956,965,963,954,959,49]),
  525: 	Mod:rename([956,965,963,954,959]++"_fil1",[956,965,963,954,959,49]),
  526:         {ok, <<"åäö2">>} = Mod:read_file([956,965,963,954,959,49]),
  527: 	{error,enoent} = Mod:read_file([956,965,963,954,959]++"_fil1"),
  528: 
  529: 	{ok,FI} = Mod:read_file_info([956,965,963,954,959,49]),
  530: 	NewMode = FI#file_info.mode band (bnot 8#333),
  531: 	NewMode2 = NewMode bor 8#222,
  532: 	true = NewMode2 =/= NewMode,
  533: 	ok = Mod:write_file_info([956,965,963,954,959,49],
  534: 				 FI#file_info{mode = NewMode}),
  535: 	{ok,#file_info{mode = NewMode}} =
  536: 	    Mod:read_file_info([956,965,963,954,959,49]),
  537: 	ok = Mod:write_file_info([956,965,963,954,959,49],
  538: 				 FI#file_info{mode = NewMode2}),
  539: 	{ok,#file_info{mode = NewMode2}} =
  540: 	    Mod:read_file_info([956,965,963,954,959,49]),
  541: 	ok
  542:     catch
  543: 	throw:need_unicode_mode ->
  544: 	    io:format("Sorry, can only run in unicode mode.~n"),
  545: 	    need_unicode_mode
  546:     after
  547: 	Mod:set_cwd(Dir),
  548:         io:format("Wd now: ~s~n",[Dir])
  549:     end.
  550: 
  551: %%
  552: %% Utilities
  553: %%
  554: 
  555: 
  556: rm_rf(Mod,Dir) ->
  557:     case  Mod:read_link_info(Dir) of
  558: 	{ok, #file_info{type = directory}} ->
  559: 	    {ok, Content} = Mod:list_dir_all(Dir),
  560: 	    [ rm_rf(Mod,filename:join(Dir,C)) || C <- Content ],
  561: 	    Mod:del_dir(Dir),
  562: 	    ok;
  563: 	{ok, #file_info{}} ->
  564: 	    Mod:delete(Dir);
  565: 	_ ->
  566: 	    ok
  567:     end.
  568: 
  569: rm_r(Mod,Dir) ->
  570:     case  Mod:read_link_info(Dir) of
  571: 	{ok, #file_info{type = directory}} ->
  572: 	    {ok,#file_info{type = directory}} =  Mod:read_file_info(Dir),
  573: 	    {ok, Content} = Mod:list_dir_all(Dir),
  574: 	    [ true = is_list(Part) || Part <- Content ],
  575: 	    [ true = is_list(filename:join(Dir,Part)) || Part <- Content ],
  576: 	    [ rm_r(Mod,filename:join(Dir,C)) || C <- Content ],
  577: 	    ok = Mod:del_dir(Dir),
  578: 	    ok;
  579: 	{ok, #file_info{type = regular}} ->
  580: 	    {ok,#file_info{type = regular}} =  Mod:read_file_info(Dir),
  581: 	    ok = Mod:delete(Dir);
  582: 	{ok, #file_info{type = symlink}} ->
  583: 	    ok = Mod:delete(Dir)
  584:     end.
  585: %% For icky test, allow binaries sometimes
  586: rm_r2(Mod,Dir) ->
  587:     %% erlang:display({rm_r2,Dir}),
  588:     case  Mod:read_link_info(Dir) of
  589: 	{ok, #file_info{type = directory}} ->
  590: 	    {ok,#file_info{type = directory}} =  Mod:read_file_info(Dir),
  591: 	    {ok, Content} = Mod:list_dir_all(Dir),
  592: 	    UniMode = file:native_name_encoding() =/= latin1,
  593: 	    [ true = (is_list(Part) orelse UniMode) || Part <- Content ],
  594: 	    [ true = (is_list(filename:join(Dir,Part)) orelse UniMode) || Part <- Content ],
  595: 	    [ rm_r2(Mod,filename:join(Dir,C)) || C <- Content ],
  596: 	    ok = Mod:del_dir(Dir),
  597: 	    ok;
  598: 	{ok, #file_info{type = regular}} ->
  599: 	    {ok,#file_info{type = regular}} =  Mod:read_file_info(Dir),
  600: 	    ok = Mod:delete(Dir);
  601: 	{ok, #file_info{type = symlink}} ->
  602: 	    ok = Mod:delete(Dir)
  603:     end.
  604: 
  605: make_normal_dir(Mod, DirName) ->
  606:     Dir = [{regular,"fil1","fil1"},
  607: 	   {regular,"fil2","fil2"},
  608: 	   {hardlink,"fil3","fil2"},
  609: 	   {symlink,"fil4","fil2"},
  610: 	   {directory,"subdir",
  611: 	    [{regular,"subfil1","subfil1"}]}],
  612:     rm_rf(Mod, DirName),
  613:     Mod:make_dir(DirName),
  614:     Mod:set_cwd(DirName),
  615:     make_dir_contents(Dir, Mod).
  616: 
  617: make_icky_dir(Mod, IckyDirName) ->
  618:     Icky = [{regular,"fil1","fil1"},
  619: 	    {regular,"åäö2","åäö2"},
  620: 	    {hardlink,"åäö3","åäö2"},
  621: 	    {symlink,"åäö4","åäö2"},
  622: 	    {regular,treat_icky(<<"åäö5">>),"åäö5"},
  623: 	    {symlink,treat_icky(<<"åäö6">>),treat_icky(<<"åäö5">>)},
  624: 	    {directory,treat_icky(<<"åäösubdir2">>),
  625: 	     [{regular,treat_icky(<<"åäösubfil2">>),"åäösubfil12"},
  626: 	      {regular,"åäösubfil3","åäösubfil13"}]},
  627: 	    {directory,"åäösubdir",
  628: 	     [{regular,"åäösubfil1","åäösubfil1"}]}],
  629:     rm_rf(Mod, IckyDirName),
  630:     ok = Mod:make_dir(IckyDirName),
  631:     ok = Mod:set_cwd(IckyDirName),
  632:     make_dir_contents(Icky, Mod).
  633: 
  634: hopeless_icky() ->
  635:     hopeless_darwin() orelse hopeless_zfs().
  636: 
  637: hopeless_darwin() ->
  638:     case {os:type(),os:version()} of
  639:         {{unix,darwin},{Major,_,_}} ->
  640:             %% icky file names worked between 10 and 17, but started returning
  641:             %% EILSEQ in 18. The check against 18..21 is exact in case newer
  642:             %% versions of Darwin support them again.
  643:             Major < 9 orelse (Major >= 18 andalso Major =< 21);
  644:         _ ->
  645:             false
  646:     end.
  647: 
  648: hopeless_zfs() ->
  649:     %% If we are using utf8only on zfs then we cannot create latin1 characters.
  650:     case os:find_executable("zfs") of
  651:         false ->
  652:             false;
  653:         _Zfs ->
  654:             case os:cmd("zfs get utf8only `pwd` | grep utf8only | awk '{print $3}'") of
  655:                 "on" ++ _ ->
  656:                     true;
  657:                 _ ->
  658:                     false
  659:             end
  660:     end.
  661: 
  662: make_very_icky_dir(Mod, DirName) ->
  663:     Desc = [{regular,"fil1","fil1"},
  664: 	    {regular,[956,965,963,954,959,49],"åäö2"},
  665: 	    {hardlink,[956,965,963,954,959,50],
  666: 	     [956,965,963,954,959,49],
  667: 	     "åäö2"},
  668: 	    {symlink,[956,965,963,954,959,51],[956,965,963,954,959,49]},
  669: 	    {regular,treat_icky(<<"åäö5">>),"åäö5"},
  670: 	    {symlink,treat_icky(<<"åäö6">>),treat_icky(<<"åäö5">>)},
  671: 	    {directory,treat_icky(<<"åäösubdir2">>),
  672: 	     [{regular,treat_icky(<<"åäösubfil2">>),"åäösubfil12"},
  673: 	      {regular,"åäösubfil3","åäösubfil13"}]},
  674: 	    {directory,[956,965,963,954,959]++"subdir1",
  675: 	     [{regular,[956,965,963,954,959]++"subfil1","åäösubfil1"}]}],
  676:     rm_rf(Mod, DirName),
  677:     ok = Mod:make_dir(DirName),
  678:     ok = Mod:set_cwd(DirName),
  679:     make_dir_contents(Desc, Mod).
  680: 
  681: %% Some OS'es simply do not allow non UTF8 filenames
  682: treat_icky(Bin) ->
  683:     case os:type() of
  684: 	{unix,darwin} ->
  685: 	    binary_to_list(procentify(Bin));
  686: 	{win32,_} ->
  687: 	    binary_to_list(Bin);
  688: 	_ ->
  689: 	    Bin
  690:     end.
  691: 
  692: %% Handle windows having absolute soft link targets.
  693: fixlink({ok,Link}) ->
  694:     case os:type() of
  695: 	{win32,_} ->
  696: 	    {ok,filename:basename(Link)};
  697: 	_ ->
  698: 	    {ok,Link}
  699:     end;
  700: fixlink(X) ->
  701:     X.
  702: 
  703: procentify(<<>>) ->
  704:     <<>>;
  705: procentify(<<X:8,Rst/binary>>) when X > 127 ->
  706:     T=procentify(Rst),
  707:     Y = list_to_binary([$% 
  708: 			| io_lib:format("~2.16B",[X])]),
  709:     <<Y/binary,T/binary>>;
  710: procentify(<<X:8,Rst/binary>>) ->
  711:     T=procentify(Rst),
  712:     <<X:8,T/binary>>.
  713: 
  714: 
  715: list([]) ->
  716:     [];
  717: list([{_,Name,_} | T]) ->
  718:     [Name | list(T)].
  719: 
  720: 
  721: get_data(FN,List) ->
  722:     case lists:keysearch(FN,2,List) of
  723: 	{value,{regular,FN,C}} ->
  724: 	    C;
  725: 	{value,{symlink,FN,NewFN}} ->
  726: 	    get_data(NewFN,List);
  727: 	_->
  728: 	    []
  729:     end.
  730: 
  731: 
  732: convlist(L) ->
  733:     convlist(file:native_name_encoding(),L).
  734: convlist(latin1,[Bin|T]) when is_binary(Bin) ->
  735:     %% erlang:display('Convert...'),
  736:     [binary_to_list(Bin)| convlist(latin1,T)];
  737: convlist(Any,[H|T]) ->
  738:     [H|convlist(Any,T)];
  739: convlist(_,[]) ->
  740:     [].
  741: 
  742: conv(L) ->
  743:     NoUniMode = file:native_name_encoding() =:= latin1,
  744:     if 
  745: 	NoUniMode, is_binary(L) ->
  746: 	    binary_to_list(L);
  747: 	true ->
  748: 	    L
  749:     end.
  750: 
  751: 
  752: make_dir_contents([{regular,Name,Contents}=H|T], Mod) ->
  753:     ok = Mod:write_file(Name, Contents),
  754:     [H|make_dir_contents(T, Mod)];
  755: make_dir_contents([{hardlink,Target,Name}|T], Mod) ->
  756:     case Mod:make_link(Name, Target) of
  757: 	ok ->
  758: 	    [{regular,Target,Name}|make_dir_contents(T, Mod)];
  759: 	{error,enotsup} ->
  760: 	    make_dir_contents(T, Mod)
  761:     end;
  762: make_dir_contents([{hardlink,Target,Name,Contents}|T], Mod) ->
  763:     case Mod:make_link(Name, Target) of
  764: 	ok ->
  765: 	    [{regular,Target,Contents}|make_dir_contents(T, Mod)];
  766: 	{error,enotsup} ->
  767: 	    make_dir_contents(T, Mod)
  768:     end;
  769: make_dir_contents([{symlink,Target,Name}=H|T], Mod) ->
  770:     case Mod:make_symlink(Name, Target) of
  771: 	ok ->
  772: 	    [H|make_dir_contents(T, Mod)];
  773: 	{error,enotsup} ->
  774: 	    make_dir_contents(T, Mod);
  775: 	{error,eperm} ->
  776: 	    make_dir_contents(T, Mod)
  777:     end;
  778: make_dir_contents([{directory,Dir,C0}|T], Mod) ->
  779:     ok = Mod:make_dir(Dir),
  780:     C1 = [case Op of
  781: 	      Link when Link =:= hardlink; Link =:= symlink ->
  782: 		  {Op,filename:join(Dir, Name0),filename:join(Dir, Extra)};
  783: 	      _ ->
  784: 		  {Op,filename:join(Dir, Name0),Extra}
  785: 	  end || {Op,Name0,Extra} <- C0],
  786:     C2 = make_dir_contents(C1, Mod),
  787:     C = [{Op,filename:basename(Name0),Extra} ||
  788: 	    {Op,Name0,Extra} <- C2],
  789:     [{directory,Dir,C}|make_dir_contents(T, Mod)];
  790: make_dir_contents([], _Mod) ->
  791:     [].
  792: 
  793: 
  794: rand_comp_decomp(Max) ->
  795:     N = rand:uniform(Max),
  796:     L = [ rand_decomp() || _ <- lists:seq(1,N) ],
  797:     LC = [ A || {A,_} <- L],
  798:     LD = lists:flatten([B || {_,B} <- L]),
  799:     LB = unicode:characters_to_binary(LD,unicode,utf8),
  800:     {LC,LB}.
  801: 
  802: rand_decomp() ->
  803:     BT = bigtup(),
  804:     SZ = tuple_size(BT),
  805:     element(rand:uniform(SZ),BT).
